name: Mattermost
natural_language_description: 这是 Mattermost 节点。主要用于: Sends data to Mattermost

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message
available_options: Channel (值: channel)
Message (值: message)
Reaction (值: reaction)
User (值: user)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new user
Deactive (值: deactive) - Deactivates the user and revokes all its sessions by archiving its user object
Get By Email (值: getByEmail) - Get a user by email
Get By ID (值: getById) - Get a user by ID
Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many users
Invite (值: invite) - Invite user to team
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

teamId.name: teamId
teamId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
teamId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Team Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

displayName.name: displayName
displayName.description: The non-unique UI name for the channel
displayName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Display Name | 作用: The non-unique UI name for the channel | (必填项)

channel.name: channel
channel.description: The unique handle for the channel, will be present in the channel URL
channel.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The unique handle for the channel, will be present in the channel URL | (必填项)

type.name: type
type.description: The type of channel to create
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: The type of channel to create | 默认值: public
available_options: Private (值: private)
Public (值: public)

channelId.name: channelId
channelId.description: ID of the channel to send the ephemeral message in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
channelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel Name or ID | 作用: ID of the channel to send the ephemeral message in. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: By default the response only contain the ID of the user. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the user automatically.
resolveData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Data | 作用: By default the response only contain the ID of the user. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the user automatically. | 默认值: True

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: True

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

userId.name: userId
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: User GUID | (必填项)

term.name: term
term.description: The search term for Channels in a Team
term.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search Term | 作用: The search term for Channels in a Team | (必填项)

postId.name: postId
postId.description: One or more (comma-separated) posts to retrieve reactions from
postId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Post ID | 作用: One or more (comma-separated) posts to retrieve reactions from | (必填项)

message.name: message
message.description: Text to send in the ephemeral message
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: Text to send in the ephemeral message

attachments.name: attachments
attachments.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachments | 作用: The attachment to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: actions (值: None) - Actions to add to message. More information can be found here.
author_icon (值: None) - Icon which should appear for the user
author_link (值: None) - Link for the author
author_name (值: None) - Name that should appear
color (值: None) - Color of the line left of text
fallback (值: None) - Required plain-text summary of the attachment
fields (值: None) - Fields to add to message
footer (值: None) - Text of footer to add
footer_icon (值: None) - Icon which should appear next to footer
image_url (值: None) - URL of image
pretext (值: None) - Text which appears before the message block
text (值: None) - Text to send
thumb_url (值: None) - URL of thumbnail
title (值: None) - Title of the message
title_link (值: None) - Link of the title

otherOptions.name: otherOptions
otherOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Other Options | 作用: Other options to set | 默认值: {}
available_options: root_id (值: None) - If set, the created message will be a threaded reply to the specified parent post ID

emojiName.name: emojiName
emojiName.description: Name of the emoji to delete
emojiName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Emoji Name | 作用: Name of the emoji to delete | (必填项)

authService.name: authService
available_options: Email (值: email)
Gitlab (值: gitlab)
Google (值: google)
LDAP (值: ldap)
Office365 (值: office365)
SAML (值: saml)

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: User's email | (必填项)

password.name: password
password.description: The password used for email authentication
password.natural_language_description: 参数名: Password | 作用: The password used for email authentication

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: since (值: None) - Only return users that have been modified since the given Unix timestamp (in milliseconds)

userIds.name: userIds
userIds.natural_language_description: 参数名: User IDs | 作用: User's ID | (必填项)

emails.name: emails
emails.description: User's email. Multiple emails can be set separated by comma.
emails.natural_language_description: 参数名: Emails | 作用: User's email. Multiple emails can be set separated by comma. | (必填项)
